com.tomeraberbach.mano.application

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • com.tomeraberbach.mano.application.Main

  • public class Main
extends javafx.application.Application
    JavaFX controller and starting point for the main application window.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Main

        public Main()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starting point for the application.
        Parameters:
        args - Ignored.

      • newOnAction

        private void newOnAction()
        Called when the 'New' button is pressed. Initializes a new instance of Code with Code.Code(), adds it to codes, and displays it in codesFX.

      • openOnAction

        private void openOnAction()
        Called when the 'Open...' button is pressed. Creates a prompt to choose a file to open. If a File was picked initializes a new instance of Code with Code.Code(File).

      • closeOnAction

        private void closeOnAction()
        Called when the 'Close' button is pressed. If codesFX contains any tabs it closes the currently selected Code document. It will prompt the user to save the Code document if there have been unsaved changes.

      • saveOnAction

        private void saveOnAction()
        Called when the 'Save' button is pressed. If codesFX contains any tabs it saves the currently selected Code document. If the selected Code document does not have a file it passes off the job to saveAsOnAction(). Otherwise it saves the Code document with Code.save(Stage).

      • saveAllOnAction

        public void saveAllOnAction()
        Called when the 'Save All' button is pressed. If codesFX contains any tabs it saves all of the Code documents. Otherwise it saves the Code document with Code.save(Stage).

      • saveAsOnAction

        private void saveAsOnAction()
        Called when the 'Save as...' button is pressed. If codesFX contains any tabs it displays a prompt for choosing where to save the current Code document. If a File is chosen will be called followed by a call to Code.saveAs(Stage).

      • assembleOnAction

        private void assembleOnAction()
        Called when the 'Assemble' button is pressed. Compiles the currently selected tab's assembly code in codes using Compiler. Logs any errors in consoleFX.

      • resetOnAction

        private void resetOnAction()
        Called when the 'Reset' button is pressed.

      • updateSimulation

        private void updateSimulation(Program program)
        Parameters:
        program - Program to load into the Computer simulation.

      • assembleAllOnAction

        private void assembleAllOnAction()
        Called when the 'Assemble All' button is pressed. Compiles all the assembly code in codes using Compiler. Logs any errors in consoleFX.

      • aboutOnAction

        private void aboutOnAction()
        Called when the 'About Mano Simulator' button is pressed. Opens an about window.

      • inputHelpOnAction

        public void inputHelpOnAction()
        Called when the '?' button is pressed. Opens a help window for input.

      • inputEnableOnAction

        private void inputEnableOnAction()
        Called when the 'Input Enable' button is pressed.

      • outputEnableOnAction

        private void outputEnableOnAction()
        Called when the 'Output Enable' button is pressed.

      • runOnAction

        private void runOnAction()
        Called when the 'Run' button is toggled.

      • stepOnAction

        private void stepOnAction()
        Called when the 'Step' button is pressed.

      • exportOnAction

        private void exportOnAction()
        Called when the 'Export' button is pressed.

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Used to launch the application.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
        Parameters:
        stage - Essentially the window to display the application in.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Occurs when the file 'main.fxml' representing the layout of the application could not be accessed.

      • bind

        private void bind()
        Binds the application controls to simulation values.

      • quitOnAction

        public void quitOnAction()
        Called when the 'Quit' button is pressed. Alerts the user about any unsaved code.
